verses.verse: At that time <S%H6256><s%> Merodach-baladan <S%H4757><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Baladan <S%H1081><s%>, king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, sent <S%H7971><s%> letters <S%H5612><s%> and a present <S%H4503><s%> to Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%>: for he had heard <S%H8085><s%> that he had been sick <S%H2470><s%>, and was recovered <S%H2388><s%>.
